Author: logic_anarchy
Content: Which package will the GF180MCU chip come in?

Author: anfroholic
Content:
If you get the bare die, you will get your raw compnents on 12mm SMT tape. 
If you ordered them to be COB, you will get them on a PCB with mezzanine connector like being discussed on #cob or the github https://github.com/wafer-space/chip-on-board-wire-bonded-pcbs
